body:
### Search before asking

-[X] I had searched in the [issues](https://github.com/apache/dolphinscheduler/issues?q=is%3Aissue) and found no similar issues.


### What happened

I am using this sql plugin
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20138947/145367592-1c70a0a7-cf94-4946-b2cd-12322509f811.png)
Only 10000 records can be exported, I want to export 100W records now. I read the source code and the default is 10000
Is there any way to solve this problem without changing the source code!


I said in the source code installation document that after I compile, why is it different from the deconstruction of the installed directory!
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20138947/145367678-05f254b4-df59-4c33-9035-98c626b0cb86.png)


### What you expected to happen

Only 10000 records can be exported, I want to export 100W records now. I read the source code and the default is 10000

### How to reproduce

I am using this sql plugin

### Anything else

Is there any way to solve this problem without changing the source code!

### Version

2.0.0

### Are you willing to submit PR?

-[X] Yes I am willing to submit a PR!

### Code of Conduct

-[X] I agree to follow this project's [Code of Conduct](https://www.apache.org/foundation/policies/conduct)

Hi:
* Thank you for your feedback, we have received your issue, Please wait patiently for a reply.
* In order for us to understand your request as soon as possible, please provide detailed information、version or pictures.
* If you haven't received a reply for a long time, you can subscribe to the developer's email，Mail subscription steps reference https://dolphinscheduler.apache.org/en-us/community/development/subscribe.html ,Then write the issue URL in the email content and send question to dev@dolphinscheduler.apache.org.
You can put the driver package in the lib/plugin/task/sql directory      It's ok
